name: Holiday Inn Express Deer Lake

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a recently opened, modern hotel, and convenient for those using the airport. The breakfast was extensive and the room very well laid out. We appreciated the large king-size bed. The location is not close to restaurants, and most of those offer fast food.
reviews.title: Best hotel of the trip

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night on way through the area. This is the newest place to stay in Deer Lake. It is very well designed and very clean. By far the most comfortable place around. It appears to be well maintained and offers a very nice morning breakfast. It is visible from the highway but you have to take a few side streets to get there which is not a problem to do. There prices seem higher that most in the area but is you want to stay in the nicest place in town I could find this is it.
reviews.title: Best place in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Proximity to the airport is pretty much the only reason to stay in Deer Lake and this was of the standard, comfortable Holiday Inn genre with a modern facility and efficient and helpful service. So, maybe not much to get excited about except that this is Newfoundland and anything in the outports that ticks all these boxes is exceptional. The hotel seems well equipped to deal with flights in and out of Deer Lake at all hours - with a limited breakfast service available from 3:00AM.
reviews.title: An modern oasis in an ancient landscape

reviews.text: This hotel was pretty much adequate, but definitely not worth the high rate which was charge ($145/night + tax). Only accepted that rate because there's nothing else near the Deer Lake Airport and I had an early flight.
reviews.title: Fine, but overpriced

reviews.text: I requested a coffee mug to use in my room instead of disposibles and was told that they didn't have any on-site at all (a glaring oversight). In the morning, the woman managing breakfast happily provided me with one and said that the front desk should have been able to do the same the night before.
reviews.title: Holiday Inn Express, Deer Lake, Newfoundland

aka: Holiday Inn Express Deer Lake Newfoundland
